Text:
Aptly named as it can practically be used to describe pretty much 99.9% of the human civilization, eh?  ;-)

Thanks for the ul, LeonardTSpock!

These once a month excursions of yours is far, far to infrequent.

You have so much to share, and so little time in which to ul!

Thanks again for the kind words, binderguy1. Man, you have no idea. I could upload nonstop, 24 hour a day for the next two weeks and I might get through half of what I already have ready to upload. But I kind of like it this way. It gives people a chance to absorb some of the books they download instead of just constantly stockpiling. Also, it makes what I do upload more of a random experience. I've got so much ready to go that I often forget what I was planning on uploading and then rediscover it the next time.
